```{R setup, echo = F, message = F, warning = F}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)

# Define main path
main_path <- here::here()

# Source helper functions
source(file.path(main_path, "R/hf_graph_and_themes.R"))
source(file.path(main_path, "R/hf_notebooks.R"))

knitr::read_chunk(file.path(main_path, "R/hf_graph_and_themes.R"))
knitr::read_chunk(file.path(main_path, "R/hf_notebooks.R"))

# Set options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, warning = F, message = F, 
                      out.width="100%", fig.align = "center", dpi = 300, 
                      fig.height = 7.2, fig.width = 7.2)
```

# Introduction {.spacer #sec:introduction}

## Script Parameters

This section defines parameters that control the behavior of the analysis pipeline. Currently, no additional parameters are required beyond those defined in the script paths section.

```{r setup-parameters}
```

## Script Paths

All supporting files are organized within the project directory structure. The man project folder is located in the `main_path` directory.

```{r setup-paths}
```


## Helper Functions

This section includes custom functions required to execute the analysis and generate the report. Functions are organized into three categories:

+ **Processing functions**: data manipulation functions required for the script execution.

```{r hf_processing, results='asis', echo = T}
```

+ **Notebook functions**: utilities for formatting tables, styling output and rendering report elements.

```{r hf_notebook, results='asis', echo = F}
write_functions(c("printPrettyDf"))
```

+ **Graphic functions**: for creating plots, visualizations and figure formatting.

```{r hf_graphics, results='asis', echo = F}
```
